title: Kalsoom Bhabhi stood up for democracy, constitution: PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 11 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif Sunday said Kalsoom Bhabhi was a courageous, fearless and dignified person who stood up for democracy and the constitution.
In a tweet on the social media platform Twitter, he said, “Kalsoom Bhabhi was a courageous & fearless woman. Dignified & soft-spoken, she fulfilled every role with near perfection. The moment one talked to her, one would be overwhelmed by her affection. She stood up for democracy & constitution when the time needed. May her soul rest in peace.”
The PM was paying tribute to Kalsoom Nawaz, wife of former prime minister Nawaz Sharif on her fourth death anniversary.
